ComicInfo.Summary:
These three canine companions have traveled out of the city, into the countryside and are now in unknown land fraught with danger. GARTH ENNIS delivers a story like no other, as an unlikely band of canines set out to survive in a world gone horribly mad and fully-painted by Michael Dipascale. Step into the mind of man's best friend in a story that is one part Animal Farm and 100% Ennis!
Available with a Regular, Wraparound, and a Dog Days Order Incentive cover by series artist Michael Dipascale.
